title: Pune
summary: Pune (Marathi: [puɳe] (listen); English:  /ˈpuːnə/) is the seventh most populous city in India and the second-largest city in the state of Maharashtra, with an estimated population of 7.4 million as of 2020.[18][19][20][21] It has been ranked as "the most liveable city in India" several times.[22] Along with the municipal corporation limits of PCMC and the three cantonment towns of Camp, Khadki and Dehu Road, Pune forms the urban core of the eponymous Pune Metropolitan Region (PMR).[23]
